website_summaries.verdict: It may cost more than other chromebooks, but the Acer Chromebook R 13 (CB5-312T-K5X4) has a full HD screen, a convertible 2-in-1 form factor, and other features to help justify its price.

customer_reviews.title: Speedy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is a good computer for a good price. It's quick, reliable and I've had no problems with it (apart from general irritating Chrome idiosyncrasies). I initially loved the size of the screen and the HDMI port was useful. Then I went to uni and found that it's actually pretty big and heavy. I'm looking to downsize now, but if it weren't for the size, I wouldn't have a problem at all. Overall I've had a great experience with this computer; I've had Chromebooks before and they've been great. I don't need to run hefty software or anything, just a good, zippy system and reliable place to write and store work.
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Chromebook for the price, providing multi function touchscreen capabilities and a good amount of internal storage (64GB). Purchased the R13 after reading a number of reviews and recommendations online, and I am not dissapointed thus far. Although the model itself is a few years old, this version manufactured in 2019, came with the latest Chrome OS operating system and updates, providing access to Google Play Store and the apps I use (Amazon Prime Video, NETFLIX etc..) without the need of tweaking the system. Performance is fast and smooth, and once you get used to the nuances of Chrome OS, this is a really easy and practical laptop to use.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Sharland

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Chrome book. Make sure you upgrade the system out the box and you shouldn't have any issues. Also haven't had any issues with the apps I use. If I do have a problem a restart fixes it. Light weight, super fast to start up and great touchscreen. I use Slashtop to access my home computer. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JACKIE

customer_reviews.title: speakers good, battery life good too
customer_reviews.text: Item works well. speakers good, battery life good too. Happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: If you are deliberating about buying this chromebook - as nike would say - just do it. The chromebook is like a big android phone screen with a keyboard. The ability to scroll up and down web pages with just your thumb on side of the screen is superb. A laptop without touchscreen now? Unthinkable!
customer_reviews.author: crispin2012

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, a brilliant Chromebook complete with android app compatibility. Word etc app work well. Great quality and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Cathrine Brennan

customer_reviews.title: A quite decent laptop
customer_reviews.text: It is a very decent laptop with quite good performance -it stutters sometimes, but nothing too laggy or annoying-.. It's a pleasant experience typing on the keyboard and the screen is really really good. The design resembles Macbook pro α lot, which is a good thing. I don't know what's really going with the hinge, because the lid is always open (laptop mode) and the laptpop sits on a steady place. PROS: 1) Design 2) Build quality 3) Display 4) Performance (just good) 5) Keyboard CONS: 1) No bakclit keyboard 2) Some apps on Google Play don't behave as expected
customer_reviews.author: Panagiotis

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Xmas present for my 10 year old, he loves it seems to do everything he wants. Does his school work on it and says it will take him into comprehensive school. Quite a snazzy Lappy actually I’d have one myself. Got this in sale at 299 so was definitely worth it when it was 399 everywhere else I’d been searching
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: light weight and thin
customer_reviews.text: A fab product for what I need it for. Can't comment on technical stuff as it's just used for communication and writing documents.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Home Schooling
customer_reviews.text: Runs great for Google Classroom, no problems with Gmail, Sheets, Docs etc. You can also run Android apps.
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: Great business tool
customer_reviews.text: Since it's android, not every app can be used on it. Apps made for Android doesn't work properly on Chromebook. It's great for those who don't play games and use it for internet surfing.
customer_reviews.author: ersh

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made. Amazing battery life, crisp image quality on the screen and the ability to run Android apps from the Play Store make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: An excellent 13" chromebook
customer_reviews.text: An excellent chromebook for its class, albeit with a bit too thin chassis for its own good.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Krastev

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Very useful of you want less Microsoft and more google apps
customer_reviews.author: Ari G

customer_reviews.title: Slimline
customer_reviews.text: Love the slimline, the quality of the screen and text
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Reed

customer_reviews.title: No real local storage so make sure you want a Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, long battery life, light, strong. Took me a while to get used to using Google docs and storing things in a downloads folders but I'm ok with that now. I'd recommend. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. LM O'Keeffe

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Acer Chromebook. Easy to set up and super fast.
customer_reviews.author: SHEILAJUNE

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought tis chrome book for my son he's absolutely delighted with it
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: its a good and fast laptop
customer_reviews.text: its a good and fast laptop....and is excellent choice for daily work....have been using it for over a month and no issues so far....
customer_reviews.author: Aditya

customer_reviews.title: Great pc notebook
customer_reviews.text: One question what is the maximum size ITF card/memory card that can be used?
customer_reviews.author: John Tainton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. First time Chromebook user and I'm so very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. Baldin

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this chrome book
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this chrome book: - good build quality - very fast - excellent screen - easy to use Everything what I need!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Complete adaptability.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in all ways. Replacement for a Windows 7 desktop.
customer_reviews.author: YANN TREVOU

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life, easy to use, portable. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: surprised on how many tabs i can have open and it still works like intended.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for browsing and casual tasks..surprised on how many tabs i can have open and it still works like intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Everything I could hope for and more. Great value for money
customer_reviews.author: LOUISA STEWART

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook, quite fast and handles all tasks without ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Great Chromebook, quite fast and handles all tasks without lagging or issues. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Farouk Hamzi

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely impressive
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful thin aluminium body taking design cues from Macs without the pricetag. Great battery life, plenty of ports for connectivity and the availability of the android PlayStore means that this chromebook has tremendous range which is only improved upon by the addition of the touch screen. A great product and excellent alternative to a similarly priced W10 laptop. My device also came with a free 3 month subscription to Google Play Music!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12 hour battery?
customer_reviews.text: The only way the battery on my new Chromebook would last 12 hours is if it was switched off. At 100% charge, after only a few weeks of very light use, emails and web pages, with bluetooth off, and all programs except Chrome closed, the battery meter shows as 9.12 hours and within a couple of minutes this drops to 8 hours. On the plus side I do like the touchscreen ability to quickly enlarge screen elements and the flat shape of the laptop top lends itself to applying a sticker skin to personalise the machine.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Very good for me personally does everything i need it for extremely well and fast.
customer_reviews.author: TONY ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: 00 and it is excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this Chromebook. I paid £255.00 and it is excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Gezci

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Feel for an Expensive Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love Chromebooks and decided to get a slightly bigger and more powerful version. The machine is fast and powerful under the hood, however, the weight and design of it makes it a disappointing purchase. It is very heavy, and although it looks nice, it's really difficult to open the lid due to the poor design which is really frustrating. The edges of the machine are sharp and uncomfortable and the keyboard sounds cheaper than my smaller Chromebook, which gives it a cheaper feel for this more expensive machine.
customer_reviews.author: David Craig White

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable piece of tech
customer_reviews.text: The chassis not stiff enough and no backlight keyboard limits when and where you can work. Processing power able to perform web browsing; instantly ready to work with; super light just like a book. Main downside - unable to establish wireless printer connection. Cloud print too much time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: EcoFriendly

customer_reviews.title: e and the Chromebook arrived in great condition. this is my second chromebook
customer_reviews.text: the delivery was without has.e and the Chromebook arrived in great condition. this is my second chromebook, and I love it. Fast, hassle free updates, great apps now with android capability. In addition the battery lasts a full working day,and even longer. And all for a super low price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wieringa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really nice Chromebook, very happy with it. Just wish it had an Intel chip option so I could run more software via crouton.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: Cool tech
customer_reviews.text: Very cool machine, wanted to go for something a little more different. Just to use for browsing, casting to tv and playing media (vidoes and music) The sound is excellent and the image is very nice. It's a good priced product compared to local shops in my area, even to include a carrier bag it came out at around the same price which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Very good Chromebook for the price
customer_reviews.text: This unit seems to be very reasonable for the price. It surpasses some functions of my Pixel 2015, specifically the flip capability. The screen is not so sharp as the Pixel 2015, but for the price is still very good.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Really good bit of kit. Good price and very elegant
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: My mother bought this laptop and she loves it. ...
customer_reviews.text: My mother bought this laptop and she loves it. The delivery came a day earlier than it was expected and computer performance is fast.
customer_reviews.author: Deyna

customer_reviews.title: I am really glad that i bought it
customer_reviews.text: I imported it from UK to Austria. I am really glad that i bought it, its just a nice machine! Android apps work actually better with ARM chips. This chip is even better than some cheap Intel Celeron chips. Some OS animations are a bit laggy (expose), but i think this is more an optimization issue than the CPU/GPUs fault. It should get fixed with the next few software updates. Web pages scroll very smooth and android apps also work very well. This machine is maybe not made for extreme Multitasking, but therefore i have my desktop anyways. I also like the rich amount of ports and the build quality is very good!
customer_reviews.author: boern

customer_reviews.title: This is what I was longing for in the first place and is a delight to use
customer_reviews.text: It seems that Chromebooks have improved somewhat since I bought my first one, This is what I was longing for in the first place and is a delight to use. I read in some of the reviews that the screen was not up to scratch, I can't for the life of me think why as the softer definition while not being as sharp as HD is somehow more realistic and having a much larger screen is a joy. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and feeling Chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: This alu body CB has a great touchscreen and can do the fancy flip fully over or use in reverse (presenter) mode or tent mode.The advantage of present is keys arent in site and speakers fire upward - so will be louder. In use it feels very nippy and can now use Android apps via Play Store. Battery life is exellent. Great touchpad. If needed can also take a micro SD fully internal but at 64GB internal I am not sure this is necessary presently. Only real negative is the lack of USB ports (just 1 USB3 and 1 USB-c - also doubles as charging port)
customer_reviews.author: BigBoots

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great improvement on chromebooks from 4 years ago.more choices and more friendly.The acer 15 is exellent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael BERE

customer_reviews.title: so easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.text: so easy to use and set up,ideal if you do not want the hassle of a windows pc,all i do is browse and watch videos which makes this perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice notebook. Is fast and cool
customer_reviews.text: I only can give it 4 stars because of the display glare. It is a nice notebook. Is fast and cool. Easy to work with and long battery life. I had to change settings to low resolution and big text display. But the glare is too much. I'm watching a video and see my own reflection on screen :) I ordered an Anti-glare screen protector. I hope this will sort out the mirror effect of the screen. Don't forget it is useless if offline.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Zamfir

customer_reviews.title: After working out how to get office online to work it has been great. Really quick and no issues would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the first chromebook we have purchased. After working out how to get office online to work it has been great. Really quick and no issues would recommend. We purchased it for our 14 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great battery, really portable.
customer_reviews.text: Great mid-upper range Chromebook. It'll easily replace your daily browsing needs, and it's great for portability. Battery life is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Very good build, it feels really sturdy. I had to log in as a guest at first to get on the browser to get the updates before I got this thing going, but now it's sweet. Very snappy and runs most android apps really well in developer mode. I really wanted the Asus c302ca but I refuse to pay £600 for it when it sells for $499 in US. (Asus, what were you thinking?) I got this for £339 but have just noticed it's now shot up to £400.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: which although it had a fantastic screen had only 16gb internal storage and a cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb machine. Bought to replace a Toshiba Chromebook 2, which although it had a fantastic screen had only 16gb internal storage and a cheap plastic build that made it feel like a Fisher Price toy. The Acer has superb aluminium build and a glass fronted full HD screen. The mediatek processor is fine for my use, handling 1080p 60fps video with ease. The screen could be a little brighter and the speakers are a bit underwhelming (bluetooth speaker needed for volume) but apart from that it is almost perfect. Play Store in beta works fine so Netflix and BBC iPlayer downloads are possible.
customer_reviews.author: Wombat

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and Uribe play
customer_reviews.text: Still no play store integration other wise would have given five stars.Great battery life and Uribe play back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really peed off about that as I loved it, right size
customer_reviews.text: Received it okay, set it up and the next day it crashed! really peed off about that as I loved it, right size, touch screen as well as keypad, brilliant. So got in touch with Amazon, they were also brilliant, sent it back and asked for a replacement. Waited and waited, the replacement did not arrive, so not able to say too much except that as a novice at all this, I loved it. Eventually got hold of Amazon about non-delivery and they could not have helped more, I then ordered the next size up. Will review that separately. If you are like me and not completely computer literate, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Pulley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop, only received yesterday but I love it. As a student, this is perfect for studying. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great looking chromebook
customer_reviews.text: It is a great looking chromebook, but unfortunately I am thinking to return it. My reasons: 1. Screen is not as sharp or great as I expected. 2. Keyboard somehow feels a bit cheap, clumsy. 3. My biggest problem: It is slow. I am using it what it is intended to do (mainly Google drive stuff) but sometimes opening a Sheet(pretty simple one) it takes somewhere around 12-15 seconds. Comparing that to my Dell laptop is really bad. 4. There is a massive lagging when playing videos.
customer_reviews.author: Zsolt B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop - SD slot lets it down.
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Really quick and smooth. Looks and feels gorgeous. I didn't give 5 stars because the screen isn't IPS and I read a review somewhere that said it was, though that was my fault for not checking the validity of the review. Other issue is the SD card slot. This is just for plugging in and pulling out, not for upgrading the memory. It doesn't allow the card to go right in so it sticks out about 1.5cms from the base, so for transport or handling, the card will need to be removed and stored elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: CE9

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen problrms
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem (I guess loose connection) with the touchscreen and, sent it to Acer for repair. Got it back with the same problem. After that back to Amazon. Still 3 stars, without the problem it would have been an amazing device I think.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Klug

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a shocking laptop, you can't do simple things like access your external hard drive, trying to install a printer onto it after downloading the relevant file and it won't open up to finish the installation. All in all not a good laptop at all, waste of money and still chasing a refund!!?!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Greatlaptop witha flawedkeyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop ... Best chromebook Ihave used sofar but you can see why I am returning it. Thereis a problemwith the keyboard, thespacebar doesnt register evertime I push it. Turns out this is a common issue andthere is no real fixforit. Ispendmore timecorrecting the text that Iam writing than actuallywriting... it couldvebeen great, but this is notgoing to work out for me. Shame
customer_reviews.author: I.G

customer_reviews.title: So far not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and feel of this laptop but as I begin to use it I keep coming up against restrictions. You cannot watch sky go, get kodi and I am struggling to access my office email. Think I will have to return this product
customer_reviews.author: Clare MccArtney

customer_reviews.title: Gadget show tested!
customer_reviews.text: Best chrome book under £400 on the market Was tested on C5 Gadget Show and highly commended
customer_reviews.author: WagonWill

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Once I'd powered up I could not believe how easy set up was have recommended to my friends & family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Acer Chromebook R13 CB5-312T - (MediaTek MT8173, 4GB RAM, 64GB eMMC, 13.3 inch HD Touchscreen Display, Google Chrome OS, Sparkly Silver)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Sparkly Silver| Size Name:13 inch (64 GB)

This Chromebook is simple to use and ideal for sharing information. Google drive protects files, documents safely and securely.

With four modes to choose from – notebook, pad, display or tent, finding the right fit for your needs has never been easier

Wrap up all tasks of the day and then return home to enjoy your favourite media content.

At just 15.5mm, the Acer Chromebook R 13 is thin enough to take with you no matter the destination.

Acer’s agile 360° hinge gives you 4 usage modes, and the flexibility to work or play anywhere.

A fan-less design keeps your device silent and dust-free at home and at work.

NOTE: Google Play Store and Android Apps supported only in Beta Channel.

BOX CONTAINS
Acer Chromebook R 13
Power adapter
User documentation





















BOX CONTAINS
Acer Chromebook R 13
power adapter
user documentation
feature_bullets: Features a large 13.3" touchscreen with 10-point touch display for increased flexibility
Innovative 360-degree hinge design for four versatile modes for work and play
Up to 12 hours battery life for work and entertainment throughout the day
Full HD display with 1920 x 1080 resolution and IPS technology for vivid viewing and sharp images and text
LED-backlit LCD delivers wide-viewing angles - perfect for students, family members, sharing videos and more.
Google Play Store and Android Apps supported only in Beta Channel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars135 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
